Package br.ufal.ic.p2.jackut.models

Class Community

java.lang.Object
br.ufal.ic.p2.jackut.models.Community
All Implemented Interfaces:
Subject, Serializable
public class Community extends Object implements Serializable, Subject
Classe que representa uma comunidade no sistema Jackut. Implementa as interfaces Subject e Serializable.
